TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinDoubleEqualsDecimal
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.d IN (SELECT e FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($3, $6)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[e]):DOUBLE]), rowType=[RecordType(DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DOUBLE e0)] +- LogicalProject(select=[e]), rowType=[RecordType(DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinFloatEqualsDecimal
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.c IN (SELECT e FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $7)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DOUBLE c0)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):DOUBLE]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DOUBLE c0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[e]):DOUBLE]), rowType=[RecordType(DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DOUBLE e0)] +- LogicalProject(select=[e]), rowType=[RecordType(DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinFloatEqualsDouble
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.c IN (SELECT d FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $6)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[d]):FLOAT]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE d, FLOAT d0)] +- LogicalProject(select=[d]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinIntEqualsDecimal
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.a IN (SELECT e FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $6)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DECIMAL(38, 18) a0)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):DECIMAL(38, 18)]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DECIMAL(38, 18) a0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[e]), rowType=[RecordType(DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinIntEqualsDouble
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.a IN (SELECT d FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $6)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DOUBLE a0)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):DOUBLE]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, DOUBLE a0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[d]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE d)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinIntEqualsFloat
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.a IN (SELECT c FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $6)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, FLOAT a0)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):FLOAT]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, FLOAT a0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[c]), rowType=[RecordType(FLOAT c)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testInToSemiJoinIntEqualsLong
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE T1.a IN (SELECT b FROM T2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $6)], joinType=[semi]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT a0)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):BIGINT]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT a0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalProject(select=[b]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT b)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testJoinConditionEqualsTypesNotEquals01
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T2) AS x ON a = x.cnt

LogicalProject(select=[a]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e, cnt]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT cnt)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $6)], joinType=[left]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT a0, BIGINT cnt)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):BIGINT]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT a0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], cnt=[COUNT()]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT cnt)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

LogicalProject(select=[a]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a)] +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e, cnt]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT cnt)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($5, $6)], joinType=[left]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT a0, BIGINT cnt)] :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e]):BIGINT]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e, BIGINT a0)] : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)] +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], cnt=[COUNT()]), rowType=[RecordType(BIGINT cnt)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, FLOAT c, DOUBLE d, DECIMAL(38, 18) e)]

TestCase.name: testJoinConditionEqualsTypesNotEquals02
TestCase.Resource: -- TC 01.04 SELECT t3a, t3b FROM T3 WHERE t3c IN (SELECT t4b FROM T4 WHERE t3a = t4a OR t3b > t4b)

LogicalProject(select=[t3a, t3b]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($2, { LogicalProject(select=[t4b]) LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(=($cor0.t3a, $0), >($cor0.t3b, $1))]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T4]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b, INTEGER t3c)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b, INTEGER t3c)]

LogicalProject(select=[t3a, t3b]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), =($1, $5), =($2, CAST($3):INTEGER))], joinType=[inner]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b, INTEGER t3c, SMALLINT t4b, VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a0, SMALLINT t3b0)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b, INTEGER t3c)] +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}]), rowType=[RecordType(SMALLINT t4b, VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] +- LogicalProject(select=[t4b, t3a, t3b]), rowType=[RecordType(SMALLINT t4b, VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(=($3, $0), >($4, $1))], joinType=[inner]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t4a, SMALLINT t4b, INTEGER t4c, VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T4]]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t4a, SMALLINT t4b, INTEGER t4c)] +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] +- LogicalProject(select=[t3a, t3b]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]]), rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) t3a, SMALLINT t3b, INTEGER t3c)]
